name: Psychedelic Limbo
description:
***Developed in 72 hours for Mini Jam 21: Stories***

Programmer: juunishi_master, daneelgames 

Art: daneelgames

Concept/writer: LynnBoass

Music: amenemone

Summary

Diamond Head arrived in some mysterious, trippy place. He met with three people, each of them telling him a story that sounds ... familiar. However, there's always a word or two that were missing in each story.

Complete the story to further understand what's going on and who Diamond Head is.

Controls
  • Move with WASD key or arrow key.
  • Press "E" to interact with NPC.
